Cyber Arts Camp

Arduino

Transmission

Now that we know how to light a single LED we will learn how to control it using code. We will learn to program the Arduino and make the LED light dance, flicker, and more!!

Ascent Checklist

  • Clean workspace
  • Arduino Uno + USB Cable
  • Breadboard
  • 2 Jumper Cables
  • Resistor
  • LED Light

Links

  • LED Blink Download this file and follow along with Alice and Ji on how to make your LED blink.
  • LED Fade Download this file and follow along with Alice and Ji on how to make your LED fade.

Mission

  • Make Your LED Dance - First learn how to make your LED blink and then learn how to make your LED fade. Next change some of the code and see if you can make the LED dance in any way you want. Donâ€™t be worried as long as your hardware is set up properly you can mess around with the code to see what happens!
